meanings.definition: Incompetent or improper management or administration.
meanings.sent1: The misadministration of the company led to financial losses.
meanings.sent2: The misadministration of the school's budget caused chaos.
meanings.sent3: The misadministration of the picnic resulted in everyone getting the wrong food.
meanings.sent4: Her misadministration of time turned her life into a chaotic mess.
meanings.sent5: The misadministration of the project was so severe that it had to be completely restarted.

meanings.definition: The act of administering something incorrectly or inefficiently.
meanings.sent1: His misadministration of the medication caused harm to the patient.
meanings.sent2: The misadministration of justice led to wrongful convictions.
meanings.sent3: The misadministration of the party invitations resulted in many guests not being informed.
meanings.sent4: The misadministration of resources left the team struggling to complete the project.
meanings.sent5: The misadministration of the exam led to confusion among the students.
